right.item:
PKU Products

Phenylalanine free protein substitutes for children and adults with Phenylketonuria (PKU): PKU gel, PKU express powder, PKU express cooler

MSUD Products

Valine, Isoleucine, and leucine free protein substitutes for children and adults with Maple Syrup Urine Disease (MSUD): MSUD gel, MSUD express powder, and Valine and Isoleucine amino acid supplements

HCU Products

Methionine free protein substitutes for children and adults with Homocystinuria (HCU): HCU gel and HCU express powder

TYR Products

Tyrosine and phenylalanine free protein substitutes for children and adults with Tyrosinaemia (TYR): TYR gel and TYR express powder

MMA/PA Products

Methionine, threonine, valine and isoleucine free, low protein substitutes for children and adults with Methylmalonic Acidemia (MMA) and Propionic Acidemia (PA)

Amino Acid Supplements

A range of Amino Acid Supplements

FlavourPac

FlavourPac are protein free flavours on a carbohydrate base containing sugar, sweeteners and colouring.

VitaBite

VitaBite is a low protein high energy supplement in the form of a chocolate bar, designed for both children and adults on protein restricted diets. VitaBite is a low protein high energy supplement in the form of a chocolate bar, designed for both children and adults on protein restricted diets.
